Adding comment system to WebHelp output

body.p:
The comment system can be added at the bottom of each topic in your WebHelp Responsive documentation or added to any website. There are three general options for installing Oxygen Feedback:
Install Oxygen Feedback in WebHelp output generated from Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
Install Oxygen Feedback in WebHelp output generated from a command line.
Install Oxygen Feedback on any HTML-based website.
